name: Trial of the Amulet
description:
My first game made with Unity as a graduation project. 

You wake up half-naked in the middle of the forest. There are some aggressive cultists hidden in the nearby cave. Kill them with your torch and take their equipment which provides more abilities.

Pants - Double jump + running
Amulet - Ranged spell attack

The rest of the items is still in development. 

Your progress will automatically save after reaching a checkpoint in a form of a campfire. Standing by the campfire also heals you slowly.

CONTROLS

The main character will always face the mouse cursor.

Walk - [AD]
Jump - [Space]
Run - [Shift]
Pick items - [E]
Attack - [Left-mouse]
Torch  - [1]
Spell ability - [2]
